snippet: The Vatican on Tuesday accepted the resignation of a Chilean bishop, Marco Antonio Ordenes Fernandez, accused of sexually abusing a minor.
abstract: Vatican accepts the resignation of Chilean Bishop Marco Antonio Ordenes Fernandez, who is accused of sexually abusing a minor.
lead_paragraph: The Vatican on Tuesday accepted the resignation of a Chilean bishop, Marco Antonio Ordenes Fernandez, accused of sexually abusing a minor.

headline.seo: Chile: Bishop Accused of Sexual Abuse Resigns
headline.main: Chile: Bishop Accused of Sexually Abusing a Minor Quits
headline.print_headline: Chile: Bishop Accused of Abuse Quits, Admitting ‘Imprudent Act’
